Question: This person was sworn in as president for the second time on January 20, 1985, in a private ceremony at the White House.
Hints: This person was also named an honorary Fellow of Keble College, Oxford.
As student president, this person led a student revolt against the college president after he tried to cut back the faculty.
In January 1987, this person underwent surgery for an enlarged prostate which caused further worries about his health.
